questions.question: What does Chandler say will be the only way people would know he was here if he dies?
options: The ass print on this chair
questions.correct_answer: The ass print on this chair
questions.explanation: Chandler says 'if I die the only way people would even know I was here, would be by the ass print on this chair!'

questions.question: What is the cost of climbing Mt. Everest, according to Phoebe?
questions.explanation: Phoebe says 'it costs like $60,000' to climb Mt. Everest.

questions.question: Why does Emily think Ross should not invite Rachel to their wedding?
options: Because Rachel is a bad dancer
Because Rachel is a bad cook
Because it might be awkward for Ross
Because Rachel is not a friend
questions.correct_answer: Because it might be awkward for Ross
questions.explanation: Emily says 'it might be a awkward for you' if Rachel is at the wedding.

questions.question: What does Ross compare his relationship with Rachel to when they are on a break?
options: A train that has left the station
A car that has run out of gas
questions.explanation: Ross says 'this ship has sailed' when talking to Rachel about their relationship.

questions.question: Why does Phoebe think Ross and Emily are meant to be?
options: Because Emily is a great cook
Because Emily is a great dancer
Because Emily spent the evening talking to Ross's friends
Because Emily is a great singer
questions.correct_answer: Because Emily spent the evening talking to Ross's friends
questions.explanation: Phoebe says 'that girl just spent the entire evening talking to your friends' when talking about Emily.

questions.question: What is the reason Rachel gives for not wanting to go to Ross's wedding?
options: Because she is not a fan of weddings
Because she is not happy for Ross
Because she is still in love with Ross
questions.correct_answer: Because she is not happy for Ross
questions.explanation: Rachel says 'I'm happy for him! I am! I really—I’m-I’m happ—I’ll work on it' when talking about Ross's wedding.

questions.question: What does Joey say about flying in the third trimester of pregnancy?
options: You should only fly first class
questions.explanation: Joey says 'you should see your faces' when Phoebe says she can't fly in her third trimester.

questions.question: What does Ross say to Rachel when she finds out about his infidelity?
questions.explanation: Ross says 'She was... she was different' when Rachel asks him about his infidelity.

questions.question: What does Rachel say to Ross when he asks her out in high school?
questions.explanation: Rachel says 'Yeah, maybe' when Ross asks her out in high school.

questions.question: Why does Ross decide to invite Rachel to his wedding?
options: Because he still has feelings for her
Because he wants to prove a point
Because he thinks it's the right thing to do
questions.correct_answer: Because he thinks it's the right thing to do
questions.explanation: Ross decides to invite Rachel to his wedding after thinking about it and looking at their past together.

questions.question: What is the name of the detergent that Rachel and Ross argue about in one of the clips?
questions.explanation: Rachel and Ross argue about the East German Laundry Detergent in one of the clips.

questions.question: What does Rachel say to Ross when he asks her if she had feelings for him?
options: I'm not sure, but I do now
questions.explanation: Rachel says 'Well, basically, lately, I've uh, I've uh, sort of had feelings for you' when talking to Ross.

questions.question: What is the reason for the flashback scenes in the episode?
options: To show Ross and Rachel's past relationship
To show Monica and Chandler's past relationship
To show Joey and Phoebe's past relationship
To show the friends' favorite memories
questions.correct_answer: To show Ross and Rachel's past relationship
questions.explanation: The flashback scenes in the episode are used to show Ross and Rachel's past relationship and how it has led up to the present moment.

questions.question: What does Phoebe say about Ross and Emily's relationship?
questions.explanation: Phoebe says 'you got like 14 hours until she has to be at the airport, and you’re sitting here in the hallway with a 28-year-old cheerleader with a fat lip' when talking about Ross and Emily's relationship.

questions.question: What is the outcome of Ross and Rachel's conversation about their past relationship?
options: They decide to get back together
They decide to go their separate ways
They decide to attend Ross's wedding together
questions.correct_answer: They decide to go their separate ways
questions.explanation: Ross and Rachel's conversation about their past relationship ends with Rachel deciding not to attend Ross's wedding and them going their separate ways.

questions.question: What does Joey say about bringing a guest to Ross's wedding?
options: He's not allowed to bring a guest
He's already found a guest to bring
He's going to bring Chandler as his guest
He's going to bring a guest to show Ross
questions.correct_answer: He's going to bring a guest to show Ross
questions.explanation: Joey says 'Don’t worry man, I get to bring a guest. We’ll show him' when talking about Ross's wedding.

questions.question: What is the reason for Rachel's hesitation to attend Ross's wedding?
options: She's still in love with Ross
She's not a fan of weddings
questions.explanation: Rachel says 'I'm happy for him! I am! I really—I’m-I’m happ—I’ll work on it' when talking about attending Ross's wedding, indicating that she's not truly happy for him.

questions.question: What does Ross say when Rachel asks him if he had feelings for her in high school?
options: I'm not sure, but I do now
questions.explanation: Ross says 'You know you probably didn't know this, but back in high school, I had a, um, major crush on you' when talking to Rachel.

questions.question: What is the significance of the prom video in the episode?
options: It shows Ross and Rachel's first kiss
It shows Monica and Chandler's first kiss
It shows Ross's feelings for Rachel in high school
questions.correct_answer: It shows Ross's feelings for Rachel in high school
questions.explanation: The prom video shows Ross's feelings for Rachel in high school, which is a significant moment in their relationship.

questions.question: What does Rachel say to Ross when he asks her to be his girlfriend again?
options: Yes, you can be my boyfriend
questions.correct_answer: Yes, you can be my boyfriend
questions.explanation: Rachel says 'Yes, you can, very much' when Ross asks her to be his girlfriend again.
